title: Java Level 1 — Basic I/O & Arithmetic
concept: Reading from stdin, printing to stdout, basic arithmetic.

challenges.title: Sum of Two Integers
challenges.description: Read two integers a and b. Print their sum a + b.
challenges.inputDescription: Two integers a and b separated by space.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: the sum of a and b.

challenges.title: Product of Two Integers
challenges.description: Read two integers and print their product.

challenges.title: Area of a Rectangle
challenges.description: Given width w and height h, print the area w * h.

challenges.title: Next and Previous
challenges.description: Given an integer n, print two integers: n-1 and n+1, separated by space.

challenges.title: Minutes to Seconds
challenges.description: Given time in minutes, convert to seconds.

challenges.title: Simple Interest
challenges.description: Given principal P, rate R (per year), time T (in years), compute simple interest = (P * R * T) / 100 as integer (floor).

challenges.title: Circle Circumference
challenges.description: Given radius r (integer), print the circumference using π ≈ 3.14. Output as double with exactly two decimal places.
challenges.outputDescription: One double value with two decimal places.

challenges.title: Fahrenheit to Celsius
challenges.description: Given temperature in Fahrenheit F, convert to Celsius C = (F - 32) * 5 / 9. Print result as integer (floor).

challenges.title: Last Digit
challenges.description: Given an integer n, print its last digit (absolute value).

challenges.title: Sum of Three Numbers
challenges.description: Read three integers and print their sum.
